title: 17-year-old shot in head, killed in Lower 9th Ward identified by New Orleans coroner
content:
A man who was fatally shot in the head in the Lower 9th Ward has been identified by the Orleans Parish Coroner as 17-year-old Robert Carter III.
Carter was found by police around 3:25 p.m. Jan. 11 lying face-down inside of an abandoned house in the 1900 block of Choctaw Street. He was pronounced dead on the scene.
The house was boarded up but there were two visible entry points, one through an opened side door and the second through an opening in the wall in the rear of the house. A neighbor, who declined to give her name out of fear for her safety, said she had not heard gunfire that day or the previous night, or seen anyone going in or out of the vacant building.
Staff writer Emily Lane contributed to this story.
Police responded to man who had been fatally shot in the head around 3:25 p.m. Jan. 11 in the 1900 block of Choctaw Street in the Lower 9th Ward, police said.
